Name: Zunius
About the game: Fate. Free will. Identity. Confront these philosophical issues and more in Zunius, a psychedelic rogue-like bullet hell. Beneath the stars, the moon and the infinite you will navigate this celestial journey as the mysterious traveller. Whom are you? Where are you? What is the nature of this universe? How can you possibly dodge all these bullets? Play this game to find answers. Key Features Infinitely replayable - discover billions of unique procedurally generated worlds Gather dozens of powerups that combine in mysterious ways Encounter multiple enemies, wave and boss formations Take risks and strategize to reap secret rewards Find friends who help you on your journey DODGE BULLETS AND SHOOT THINGS!
Meta Title: Zunius: Oct 17, 2019, COAF Research and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Zunius? Check out the release date (Oct 17, 2019), developer insights from COAF Research, and a complete game summary.
